description: {"blocks":[{"key":"84i6u","text":"This protocol describes how to detect alpha-synuclein in protein derived from STC-1 cells by western blot using DAB/peroxidase or ECL to visualise the bands.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"55hb7","text":"RIPA buffer (50 mM Tris-HCl, pH 8.0, with 150 mM sodium chloride, 1.0% Igepal CA-630 (NP-40), 0.5% sodium deoxycholate, and 0.1% sodium dodecyl sulphate)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7m8nr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eq6ld","text":"Protease inhibitors (0.8 μM Aprotinin, 40 μM Bestatin, 140 μM E-64 at, Leupeptin at 20 μM and Pepstatin A at 15 μM, 1mM phenylmethanesulfonyl fluoride)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fi76g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"485kp","text":"Towbin transfer buffer: 25 mM Tris, 192 mM glycine, pH 8.3, with 20% methanol (vol/vol).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"i31c","text":"To prepare 1 L of buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"85v5v","text":"- 800 mL distilled H2O","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1vl5p","text":"- 200 mL methanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5o0lr","text":"- 3.03 g Tris base","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ftpnt","text":"- 14.4 g Glycine","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"152gj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3beoq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a06pp","text":"Sample preparation using either protein pellet from an extraction (step 1.1) or direct lysis (step 1.2)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":103},{"style":"bold","offset":77,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fclbv","text":"Separate samples (~ 10 ug total protein)  by polyacrylamide gel electrophoresis using precast Bolt™ or NuPAGE™ 12%, Bis-Tris, 1.0 mm, Mini Protein Gels at 180 V   or until dye front reaches the bottom of the gel. Run with pre-stained or biotinylated size markers","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":161,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f3i49","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":2700,"guid":"426713C0BCFE11ED8C5B43B5A8FDC981","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ptkb","text":"Wet PVDF membrane with methanol and then equilibrate in Towbin buffer (see materials)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bm7lg","text":"Mix samples with 4x NuPAGE™ LDS sample buffer containing 50 mM dithiothreitol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bujfm","text":"Vortex   twice, then orbital shaker    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":36,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9g1te","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":20,"guid":"40B8B389BDBD11ED899C0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"6E1E4A20BCFD11ED8C5B43B5A8FDC981","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"260","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"78895F90BCFD11ED8C5B43B5A8FDC981","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2f8kq","text":"Dissolve protein pellets from the TRI Reagent® extraction in 2% SDS containing 8 M urea. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2dekd","text":"Vortex   twice, then orbital shaker    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":36,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"mjlg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"B94D0FD0BDBC11EDB9B3CFCC748A656C","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":true,"guid":"09B04C50BCFD11ED8C5B43B5A8FDC981","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"260","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"304D3F30BCFD11ED8C5B43B5A8FDC981","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e9q33","text":"Dissolve cells in RIPA buffer containing protease inhibitors (see Materials)    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":77,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":79,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cdcd8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"3C915A60BCFD11ED8C5B43B5A8FDC981","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"54D5F810BCFD11ED8C5B43B5A8FDC981","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8alek","text":"Fix proteins to membrane for  with 4% paraformaldehyde","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5br70","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"584E6080BCFE11ED8C5B43B5A8FDC981","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"43a5l","text":"Wash with PBST (PBS containing 0.01% (v/v) Tween™-20) 4 x  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5h9is","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"6C744E30BCFE11ED8C5B43B5A8FDC981","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"s026","text":"Block non-specific binding sites with block solution (PBST containing 2% (w/v) BSA and 0.005 % (w/v) thiomersal) for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":117,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fimf1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"7BE20B00BCFE11ED8C5B43B5A8FDC981","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"p8pv","text":"Incubate membranes in block solution containing rabbit monoclonal antibody against α-synuclein (1:1250) (ab212184) and β-actin (1:5000) (ab241153)     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":147,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":149,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eg08q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":72000,"guid":"87185FB0BCFE11ED8C5B43B5A8FDC981","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"892B1310BCFE11ED8C5B43B5A8FDC981","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3vsm3","text":"Wash with PBST 4 x  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":19,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"D89FB940BCFE11EDAAE10A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e4qn","text":"Incubate membrane with secondary antibody in block solution (step 15.1 or step 15.2)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":84},{"style":"bold","offset":71,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8dato","text":"Wash with PBST 4 x  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":19,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"4503C36BBCFF11EDAAE10A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fjcoh","text":"incubated  with peroxidase conjugated streptavidin (1:1000) (Roche)  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":68,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9v0e2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":2700,"guid":"07C75620BCFF11ED8C5B43B5A8FDC981","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aj9jb","text":"Wash with PBST 4 x  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":15,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":19,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2jtvp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"6200F400BD0111ED8C5B43B5A8FDC981","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5esu3","text":"Wash with PBS 2 x  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"E445C954BD0111EDAAE10A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8hd3v","text":"Visualise bands with DAB if biotinylated secondary and streptavidin-peroxidase were used (step 20.1) or  use ECL plus (Amersham) if anti-rabbit peroxidase secondary was used (step 20.4)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":185},{"style":"bold","offset":101,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b2skj","text":"Visualize ECL or digitize DAB stained membrane using a ChemiDoc™ MP imaging system (Biorad) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"87lqm","text":"For DAB detection incubate in PBS containing 0.05 % (w/v) 3,3′-diaminobenzidine, 0.015 % (v/v) H2O2 and 0.05 % (w/v) nickel ammonium sulphate for ≤   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17},{"style":"sub","offset":96,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":98,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":148,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dfnrn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"E5167510BCFF11ED8C5B43B5A8FDC981","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"64la3","text":"Dry membrane 60ºC 1 hour ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d1nf","text":"Incubate membrane with biotinylated goat anti-rabbit IgG (1:1000) (Stratech)   and go to step 16","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":89,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":77,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1176q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":4500,"guid":"E6C727C0BCFE11ED8C5B43B5A8FDC981","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bj9dm","text":" OR incubate membrane with goat anti-rabbit conjugated to peroxidase (1:25,000) (Stratech)    and go to step 18","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":1,"length":2},{"style":"bold","offset":104,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":92,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9amvo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":4500,"guid":"F74199A0BCFE11ED8C5B43B5A8FDC981","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dtn98","text":"Rinse in running tap water \u003e  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5jrb8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"5AC8B18DBD0011EDAAE10A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fonjj","text":"ECL reagents can be washed off the membrane and the membrane then processed for DAB staining if desired","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"edjjv","text":"For chemiluminescent detection use an Amersham ECL plus kit according to the manufacturer's instructions","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":30}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8cm8h","text":"Place cassette in transfer tank and transfer protein onto 0.2 mm PVDF (polyvinylidene difluoride) membranes (30 V,   in Towbin buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":115,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"94712582BDBE11ED899C0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9kl59","text":" Heat samples     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":16,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C274E2FBBD0C11EDAAE10A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"70","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C274E3F8BD0C11EDAAE10A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"70","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d4g59","text":"Soak transfer sandwich components (4 sheets of filter paper and 5 blotting pads) in Towbin transfer buffer and assemble in the transfer cassette in the following order:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9pqcn","text":"Starting with the cathode plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5dkt4","text":"2 x blotting pads","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1renh","text":"2 x filter paper","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"19pd8","text":"gel","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8aiem","text":"PVDF","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2i67h","text":"2 x filter paper","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2hqtl","text":"3 x pad (use 3 because there is less chance of the gel slipping)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fae76","text":"Use a roller to remove any air bubbles  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8a1jg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"62370160BE7011EDBB460920CA4A9FC0","height":289,"id":359120,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"thumbnail_image001.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k8yub4epx.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k8ysb4epx.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k8ytb4epx.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k8yrb4epx.webp","width":550}}}}

Vortex   then centrifuge again   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":19,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":67,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":91,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6eaia","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"07930E60BDBD11EDB9B3CFCC748A656C","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":20,"guid":"19DC73E0BDBD11EDB9B3CFCC748A656C","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"3CFAC750BDBD11EDB9B3CFCC748A656C","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

title: Western blot - alpha-synuclein
